div.style: display: flex; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; left: 0; top: 0px
display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; position: relative
display: flex; width: 48px; margin-right: 1px; flex-direction: row; align-items: flex-start
display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-start

img.style: width: 36px; height: 36px; align-self: flex-start; margin-left: 1px; position: relative

label.style: align-self: flex-start; font-size: 18px; color: @Color_Hue170_H7; line-height: 22px; text-overflow: ellipsis; overflow: hidden; margin-top: -2px; position: relative

div.style: display: flex; overflow: visible; flex-direction: row; align-items: center

label.style: align-self: center; margin-right: 0px; font-size: 26px; color: @Color_Black; line-height: 26px
